name: Aligned Global
tag_list: software-outsourcing, software-application-outsourcing, web-2-0, web-development, internet-developement, start-ups
overview:
Aligned Global provides innovative low-cost web, rich media and software development to creative agencies, start-ups and technology-enabled companies.

Aligned Global is comprised of industry professionals and engineering experts that help customers achieve results by leveraging our experience and global engineering talent.

The ability to bring new ideas, new products, new versions or new features to the market quickly is paramount for today’s technology-enabled businesses. Defining and developing effective business strategies and technologies to meet the demands of your business and customers are key aspects in meeting that objective. Whether you need to create a new web presence for your business, revitalize an existing site, integrate an e-commerce solution to drive sales, add a micro-site or develop a market ready software solution for your business and customers, we have the experience, organizational scale, and engineering resources required to develop the best solution and deliver a market-ready product. How can we help you?
